import React, {useState} from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import apiCategory from './../../../../api/categoryApi'; import { useParams, useHistory } from 'react-router-dom'; const CategoriesManger = ({categories, onRemove}) => { const removeHandle = async(id) => { const { data } = await apiCategory.remove(id); const newCategory = categories.filter(category => category.id !== data.id); } return (
